author: .paulharris
content: When we fixed dependent root, it basically “broke” what v1 did. We can try to change it so that it just lies, which is basically what lighthouse did initially, it just is reporting actual dependent root currently… it won’t be until after our release we’re cutting at the moment though. Ideally everyone had implemented the dependent root changes for fulu and this wouldn’t need to enshrine the incorrect behaviour

author: .paulharris
content: Old behaviour would also be to not query next epoch for proposers, but I’m guessing you still want to be able to query future epoch AND have this hacked dependent root, or do you not need to be able to query next epoch (like in Electra) proposers until epoch transition?
